meanings.definition: A small cucumber pickled in vinegar.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy snacking on gherkins during picnics.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich was delicious with a side of gherkins.
meanings.sent3: The gherkins in the salad were so tangy, they made me pucker.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a jar of gherkins, infectious and delightful.
meanings.sent5: The gherkins added a burst of flavor to the dish.
